# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 中的数据丢失防护包括许多可供您用于 DLP 策略的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-113">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-115">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-117">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-118">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-119">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-120">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-121">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-122">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-123">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-128">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-129">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-131">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-149">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-151">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-153">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-154">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-155">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-157">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-163">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-164">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-170">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-176">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-178">包含或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-180">帐号为 6 到 10 位数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-181">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-182">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-183">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-184">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-186">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-189">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-190">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-191">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-193">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-194">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-207">banking information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-207">banking information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-208">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-208">full names</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-210">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-211">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-212">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-213">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-214">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-215">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-216">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-218">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-220">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-221">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-222">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-223">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-224">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-225">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-226">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-229">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-232">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-233">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-235">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-245">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-246">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-247">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-248">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-249">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-250">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-251">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-253">带分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-254">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-255">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-256">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-257">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-258">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-259">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-260">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-265">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-266">找到搜索Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-267">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-268">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-271">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-271">acn</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-278">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-280">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-281">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-282">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-283">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-284">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-285">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-286">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-287">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-288">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-289">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-290">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-294">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-295">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-296">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-297">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-319">Driver' Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-319">Driver' Lic</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-397">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-399">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-401">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-402">第一个数字的范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-403">第九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-404">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-405">第 1 (个数字) 可选数字是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-407">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-410">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-411">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-412">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-413">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-413">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-414">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-415">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-416">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-416">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-417">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-418">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-418">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-419">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-419">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-420">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-420">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-421">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-421">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-422">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-422">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-423">一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-423">medicare</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-424">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-426">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-428">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-430">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-433">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-434">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-468">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-470">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-472">8 到 9 个数字通常显示空格，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-473">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-474">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-475">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-476">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-477">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-478">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-479">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-480">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-481">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-482">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-483">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-484">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-489">medicare levy</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-496">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-497">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-498">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-498">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-499">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-500">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-500">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-501">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-502">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-502">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-503">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-504">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-505">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-505">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-506">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-506">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-633">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-633">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-634">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-635">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-636">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-637">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-638">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-639">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-641">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-641">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-643">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-643">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="e477d-644">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-644">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-645">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-645">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-647">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-647">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-650">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-650">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-651">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-651">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-653">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-656">personalausichsich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-656">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-657">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-657">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-658">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-658">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-660">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-660">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-662">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-662">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-663">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-663">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-664">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-664">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-665">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-665">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-667">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-667">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-669">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-669">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-670">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-670">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-671">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-671">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-692">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-692">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-693">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-693">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-695">指定格式的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-695">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-697">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-697">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-698">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-698">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-699">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-699">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-700">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-700">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-702">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-704">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-704">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-705">函数"Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-705">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-706">_or_equivalent"查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-706">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-707">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-707">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-708">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-709">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-709">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-725">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-725">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-727">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-727">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-728">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-729">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-729">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-730">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-730">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-731">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-731">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-732">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-732">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-733">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-733">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-734">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-734">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-735">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-736">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-736">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-737">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-738">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-739">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-739">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-740">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-740">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-741">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-741">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-742">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-742">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-765">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-765">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-766">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-766">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-767">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-767">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-768">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-768">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-769">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-769">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-770">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-770">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-771">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-771">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-772">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-773">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-773">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-774">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-775">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-775">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-776">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-776">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-777">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-777">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-778">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-778">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-779">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-779">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-780">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-780">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-781">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-781">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-782">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-782">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-783">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-783">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-784">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-784">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-785">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-785">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-786">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-787">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-788">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-789">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-790">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-790">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-791">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-791">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-792">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-793">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-793">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-811">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-811">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-812">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-813">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-813">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-814">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-814">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-815">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-815">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-816">3-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-816">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-817">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-817">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-818">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-818">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-819">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-819">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-820">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-821">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-822">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-823">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-823">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-824">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-824">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-825">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-825">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-840">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-840">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-842">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-842">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-843">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-843">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-844">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-844">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-845">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-845">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-846">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-847">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-847">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-848">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-848">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-849">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-849">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-850">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-850">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-851">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-851">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-852">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-852">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-853">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-853">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-854">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-854">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-855">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-855">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-856">1-300 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-856">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-857">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-857">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-858">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-858">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-859">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-859">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-860">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-860">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-861">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-861">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-862">a semicolon (;) ， quotation mark (") ， or apostrophe (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-862">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-863">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-864">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-865">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-866">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-866">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-867">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-867">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-868">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-868">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-883">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-883">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-893">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-893">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-894">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-894">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-895">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-895">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-896">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-896">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-897">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-897">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-898">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-898">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-899">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-900">43 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-900">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-901">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-901">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-902">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-903">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-903">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-904">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-905">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-905">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-906">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-906">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-907">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-907">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-922">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-922">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-923">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-924">字符串"userpwd="后跟字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-924">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-925">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-925">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-926">字符串"userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-926">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-927">60 个小写字母或数字的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-927">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-928">引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-928">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-929">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-929">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-930">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-930">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-931">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-931">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-932">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-932">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-933">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-933">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-934">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-934">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-949">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-949">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-951">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-951">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-952">net"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-952">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-953">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-953">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-954">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-954">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-955">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-955">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-956">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-956">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-957">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-957">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-958">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-958">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-959">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-959">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-960">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-960">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-961">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-961">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-962">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-962">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-963">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-964">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-964">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-965">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-966">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-966">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-967">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-967">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-968">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-968">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-979">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-979">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-980">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-980">com</span></span>
