## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-983">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-983">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-984">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-985">字符串"sig"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-985">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-986">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-986">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-987">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-987">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-988">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-988">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-989">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-989">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-990">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-990">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-991">小写字母或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-991">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-992">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-992">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-993">不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的任何字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-993">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-994">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-995">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-995">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-996">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-997">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-997">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-998">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-998">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-999">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-999">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1000">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1000">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1005">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1006">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1006">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1007">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1007">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1008">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1008">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1009">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1009">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1010">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1010">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1011">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1011">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1012">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1012">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1013">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1014">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1014">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1015">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1015">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1016">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1016">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1017">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1017">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1018">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1019">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1019">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1020">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1021">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1021">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1022">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1022">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1023">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1023">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1038">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1038">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1039">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1039">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1040">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1040">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1041">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1041">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1042">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1042">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1043">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1044">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1044">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1045">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1045">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1046">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1046">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1047">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1047">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1048">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1048">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1049">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1049">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1050">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1050">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1051">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1051">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1052">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1052">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1053">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1054">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1054">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1055">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1056">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1057">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1057">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1058">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1058">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1059">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1059">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1077">Azure 存储帐户密钥 (通用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1077">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1078">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1079">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1079">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1080">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1080">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1081">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1081">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1082">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1082">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1083">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1083">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1084">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1084">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1085">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1085">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1086">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1086">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1087">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1087">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1088">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1088">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1089">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1089">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1091">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1091">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1093">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1093">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1094">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1095">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1096">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1098">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1098">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1099">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1099">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1232">比利时国家/区号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1232">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1234">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1234">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1235">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1236">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1236">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1237">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。MM.DD出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1237">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1238">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1238">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1239">三个连续的数字 (为男性的奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1239">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1240">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1240">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1241">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1241">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1242">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1243">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1243">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1244">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1245">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1245">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1246">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1246">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1247">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1247">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1248">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1248">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1249">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1250">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1250">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1251">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1251">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1310">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1310">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1311">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1311">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1312">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1313">两个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1313">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1314">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1314">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1315">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1315">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1316">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1317">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1317">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1318">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1319">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1319">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1320">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1320">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1321">找到一个  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1321">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1345">比利时社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1345">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1346">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1346">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1347">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1348">11 个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1348">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1349">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1350">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1350">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1351">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1352">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1352">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1353">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1354">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1355">该  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1355">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1356">找到一个  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1356">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1357">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1358">该  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1358">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1378">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1378">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1379">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1379">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1380">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1380">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1381">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1381">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1382">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1382">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1383">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1383">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1384">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1384">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1385">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1386">12 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1386">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1387">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1387">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1388">12 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1388">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1389">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1389">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1390">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1390">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1391">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1391">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1392">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1392">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1393">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1393">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1394">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1394">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1395">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1395">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1396">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1396">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1397">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1398">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1398">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1399">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1400">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1400">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1401">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1401">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1402">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1402">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1403">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1403">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1404">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1404">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1406">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1406">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1407">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1407">nº tva</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1409">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1409">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1410">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1410">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1411">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1411">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1412">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1412">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1416">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1416">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1418">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1418">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1419">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1420">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1420">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1421">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1421">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1422">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1422">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1423">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1423">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1424">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1424">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1425">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1425">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1426">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1426">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1427">两个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1427">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1428">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1428">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1429">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1429">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1430">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1431">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1431">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1432">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1433">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1433">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1434">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1434">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1435">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1435">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1436">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1436">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1437">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1438">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1438">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1439">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1441">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1441">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1442">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1442">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1444">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1444">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1445">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1445">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1446">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1446">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1447">一名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1447">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1448">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1448">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1449">Inscriço</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1449">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1450">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1450">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1451">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1451">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1452">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1453">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1453">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1454">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1455">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1455">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1456">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1457">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1457">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1458">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1459">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1459">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1460">前八 (三个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1460">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1461">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1461">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1462">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1462">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1463">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1463">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1464">两个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1464">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1465">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1466">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1467">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1468">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1469">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1469">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1470">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1470">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1471">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1472">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1473">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1473">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1474">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1476">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1476">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1479">CNPJ-MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1479">CNPJ-MF</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1480">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1480">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1484">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1484">Registration Status</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1485">商业版</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1485">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1486">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1486">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1487">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1487">CNPJ</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1496">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1496">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1497">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1498">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1498">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1499">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1499">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1500">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1501">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1501">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1502">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1502">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1503">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1503">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1504">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1504">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1505">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1505">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1506">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1507">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1507">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1508">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1508">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1509">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1509">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1510">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1510">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1511">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1511">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1512">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1512">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1513">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1514">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1514">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1515">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1516">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1516">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1517">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1517">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1518">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1518">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1519">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1519">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1520">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1520">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1521">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1521">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1522">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1522">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1523">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1524">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1524">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1525">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1525">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1526">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1526">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1527">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1527">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1528">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1528">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1529">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1529">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1530">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1530">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1531">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1531">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1532">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1532">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1533">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1533">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1534">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1535">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1535">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1536">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1537">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1537">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1538">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1539">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1539">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1540">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1541">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1541">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1542">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1542">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1543">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1543">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1670">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1670">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1671">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1671">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1672">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1672">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1673">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1673">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1674">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1674">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1675">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1675">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1676">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1676">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1677">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1678">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1678">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1679">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1680">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1680">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1681">与 YYMMDD (的出生日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1681">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1682">对应于出生日期的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1682">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1683">对应于性别的一个数字：一个偶数（男性）和一个奇数（对于男性）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1683">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1684">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1684">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1686">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1686">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1688">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1688">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1689">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1689">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1690">找到一个  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1690">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1692">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1692">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1737">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1737">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1738">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1738">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1739">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1740">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1740">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1741">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1742">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1742">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1743">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1744">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1744">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1745">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1746">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1747">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1747">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1748">找到或  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1748">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1765">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1765">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1766">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1767">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1767">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1769">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1769">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1770">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1770">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1771">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1771">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1772">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1772">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1773">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1773">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1774">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1774">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1775">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1775">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1776">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1777">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1777">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1778">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1779">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1779">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1780">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1781">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1782">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1782">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1783">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1784">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1784">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1785">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1785">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1809">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1809">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1810">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1811">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1811">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1812">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1813">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1813">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1814">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1815">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1815">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1816">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1817">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1817">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1818">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1818">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1819">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1819">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1820">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1820">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1821">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1821">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1822">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1822">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1823">省/市/自治区的缩写，例如 AB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1823">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1824">省名称，例如 Alberta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1824">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1825">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1825">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1956">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1956">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1957">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1957">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1958">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1958">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1959">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1959">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1960">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1960">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1961">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1962">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1962">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1963">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1964">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1965">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1965">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1966">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1966">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>


## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1978">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1978">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1979">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1980">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1980">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1981">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1982">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1982">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1983">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1984">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-1985">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-1986">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1987">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1987">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-1988">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-1988">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2018">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2018">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2019">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2019">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2020">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2020">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2021">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2021">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2022">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2022">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2023">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2024">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2024">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2025">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2026">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2027">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2027">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2028">至少找到两个Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2028">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
