## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2061">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2061">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2062">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2063">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2063">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2064">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2065">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2065">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2066">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2066">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2067">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2067">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2068">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2068">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2069">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2069">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2070">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2070">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2071">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2071">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2072">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2073">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2074">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2075">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2075">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2076">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2076">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2077">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2077">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2078">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2078">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2079">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2079">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2080">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2080">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2081">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2082">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2082">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2083">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2083">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2084">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2084">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2085">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2085">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2110">智利身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2110">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2111">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2112">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2112">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2114">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2114">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2115">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2115">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2116">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2116">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2117">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2117">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2118">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2118">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2119">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2119">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2120">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2120">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2121">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2121">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2122">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2123">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2124">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2125">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2126">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2127">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2127">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2128">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2130">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2130">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2131">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2168">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2168">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2169">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2169">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2170">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2170">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2171">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2171">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2172">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2172">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2173">六个数字，即地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2173">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2174">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2174">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2175">三个数字，即订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2175">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2176">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2176">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2177">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2178">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2178">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2179">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2180">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2180">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2181">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2182">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2182">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2183">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2183">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2184">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2185">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2185">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2186">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2199">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2199">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2200">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2201">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2201">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2203">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2203">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2204">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2205">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2205">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2206">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2207">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2207">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2208">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2208">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2209">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2209">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2210">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2210">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2211">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2211">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2212">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2212">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2213">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2214">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2214">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2215">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2215">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2216">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2216">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2476">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2476">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2478">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2478">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2479">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2480">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2480">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2481">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2482">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2482">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2483">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2484">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2485">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2485">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2486">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2486">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2610">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2610">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2611">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2611">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2612">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2613">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2613">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2614">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2615">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2615">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2616">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2617">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2618">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2619">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2620">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2620">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2621">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2621">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2652">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2652">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2653">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2653">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2655">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2655">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2657">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2657">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2659">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2659">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2661">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2661">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2662">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2663">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2681">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2683">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2685">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2686">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2686">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2687">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2689">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2691">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2692">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2693">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2694">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2696">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2697">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2698">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2698">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2699">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2699">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2700">majstorski broj graana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2700">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2701">master citizen number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2701">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2702">nacionalni identifciocijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2702">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2703">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2703">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2704">oib#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2704">oib#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2705">oib</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2705">oib</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2706">osobna iskaznica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2706">osobna iskaznica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2707">osobni id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2707">osobni id</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2728">克罗地亚社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2728">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2729">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2731">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2731">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2732">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2733">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2733">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2734">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2734">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2735">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2735">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2736">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2737">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2738">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2739">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2740">该  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2740">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2741">找到一个  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2741">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2742">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2743">该  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2743">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2760">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2760">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2762">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2762">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2763">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2764">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2764">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2766">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2768">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2769">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2769">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2770">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2895">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2895">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2896">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2897">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2898">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2899">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2900">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2901">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2903">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2903">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2904">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2905">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2905">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2907">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2907">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2909">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2909">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2910">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2910">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2911">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2911">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2912">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2912">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2913">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2913">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2914">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2914">id card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2916">kim karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2916">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2917">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2917">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2918">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2918">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2920">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2920">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2921">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2921">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2923">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2924">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2925">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2926">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2927">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2928">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2929">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2929">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2930">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2931">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2957">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2957">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2958">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2958">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2959">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2959">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2960">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2960">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2961">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2961">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2962">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2962">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2963">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2963">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2964">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2965">指定模式中八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2965">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2966">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2967">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2967">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2968">a "0" or "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2968">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2969">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2969">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2970">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2970">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2971">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2972">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2972">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-2973">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2974">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2975">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2975">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2976">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2976">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-2977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-2978">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-2978">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3006">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3006">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3007">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3007">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3008">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3008">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3009">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3009">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3010">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3010">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3011">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3011">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3012">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3012">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3013">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3013">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3014">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3014">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3015">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3016">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3017">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3018">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3019">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3019">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3020">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3146">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3146">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3147">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3147">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3148">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3148">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3149">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3149">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3150">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3150">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3151">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3151">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3152">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3153">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3153">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3154">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3155">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3156">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3156">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3157">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3157">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3176">捷克语个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3176">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3178">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 十个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3178">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3180">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3180">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3181">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3181">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3182">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3182">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3183">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3183">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3184">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3184">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3185">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3185">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3186">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3186">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3187">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3187">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3188">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3188">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3189">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3189">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3190">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3190">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3191">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3191">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3192">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3192">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3193">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3193">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3194">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3194">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3196">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3196">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3197">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3197">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3244">捷克身份证号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3244">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3245">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3245">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3246">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3247">10 个数字和指定模式中的反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3247">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3248">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3249">10 个数字和一个反杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3249">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3250">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3250">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3251">反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3251">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3252">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，该序列号将同一日期的人分开</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3252">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3253">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3253">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3254">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3255">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3255">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3256">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3257">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3257">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3258">该  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3258">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3259">找到一个  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3259">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3260">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3260">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3261">该  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3261">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3277">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3277">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3278">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3279">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3279">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3280">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3281">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3281">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3282">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3283">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3283">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3284">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3285">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3286">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3286">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3287">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3287">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3411">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3411">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3412">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3414">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3416">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3418">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3420">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3421">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3421">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3422">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3422">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3439">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3439">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3441">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3441">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3443">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3443">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3444">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3444">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3445">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3445">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3446">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3446">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3448">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3451">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3452">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3452">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3453">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3453">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3454">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3455">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3455">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3456">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3456">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3528">丹麦社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3528">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3529">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3529">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3531">指定模式中的十个数字和连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3531">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3533">10 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3533">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3534">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3534">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3535">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3535">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3536">对应于序列号的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3536">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3537">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3538">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3538">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3539">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3540">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3541">该  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3541">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3542">找到一个  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3542">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3543">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3544">该  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3544">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3545">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3545">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3546">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3546">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3547">个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3547">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3548">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3548">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3549">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3549">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3550">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3550">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3551">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3551">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3552">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3552">ssn</span></span>
