## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3558">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3558">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3559">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3560">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3560">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3561">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3562">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3562">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3563">一个字母 (可能) 字母集不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3563">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3564">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3564">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3565">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3565">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3566">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3567">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3567">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3568">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3570">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3570">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3571">找到一个 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3571">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3572">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3572">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3573">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3573">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3574">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3574">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3575">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3575">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3576">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3576">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3577">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3577">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3578">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3578">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3579">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3579">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3580">非法强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3580">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3581">管制局</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3581">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3582">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3582">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3583">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3584">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3584">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3585">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3586">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3586">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3587">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3587">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3588">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3588">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3589">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3590">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3590">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3591">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3592">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3592">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3593">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3593">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3594">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3594">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3720">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3720">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3721">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3721">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3722">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3722">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3723">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3723">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3724">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3724">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3725">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3725">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3726">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3726">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3728">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3728">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3730">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3730">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3731">一个数字，对应于性生活和百年 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3731">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3732">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3732">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3733">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，分隔同一日期的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3733">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3734">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3734">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3735">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3736">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3736">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3737">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3738">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3739">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3739">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3740">找到一个  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3740">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3741">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3741">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3742">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3742">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3775">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3775">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3776">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3776">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3777">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3777">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3778">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3778">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3779">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3779">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3780">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3780">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3781">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3782">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3782">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3783">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3784">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3784">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3785">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3785">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3786">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3787">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3787">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3788">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3788">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3801">欧盟借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3801">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3802">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3803">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3803">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3804">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3805">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3805">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3806">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3807">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-3808">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-3809">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3810">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3810">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3811">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3811">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3812">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3812">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3813">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3813">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3814">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3814">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3815">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3815">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3816">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3816">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-3817">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-3817">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4263">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4263">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4264">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4265">包含连字符的十个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4265">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4267">包含连字符的十个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4267">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4268">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4268">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4269">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4269">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4270">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4270">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4271">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4271">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4273">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4276">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4276">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4277">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4408">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4408">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4409">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4409">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4410">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4410">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4411">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4411">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4412">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4412">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4413">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4413">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4414">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4414">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4415">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4416">20 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4416">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4417">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4418">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4418">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4419">十位数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4419">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4420">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4420">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4421">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4421">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4422">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4423">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4423">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4424">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4425">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4425">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4426">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4426">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4427">找到搜索Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4427">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4445">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4445">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4446">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4447">六个数字加上一个字符，指示一个世纪加三个数字加上一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4447">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4448">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4449">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4449">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4450">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4450">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4451">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4451">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4452">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4452">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4453">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4453">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4454">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4455">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4456">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4457">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4458">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4458">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4459">找到Keyword_finnish_national_id关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4459">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4460">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4460">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4461">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4461">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4462">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4462">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4463">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4463">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4512">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4512">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4513">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4513">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4514">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4515">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4515">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4516">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4517">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4517">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4518">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4518">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4519">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4519">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4521">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4523">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4524">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4524">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4525">找到来自Keywords_eu_passport_number_common或Keyword_finland_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4525">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4546">芬兰社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4546">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4547">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4547">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4548">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4549">指定格式的 11 个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4549">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4550">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4551">指定格式的 11 个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4551">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4552">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4552">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4553">以下其中一个实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4553">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4554">加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4554">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4555">减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4555">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4556">字母"A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4556">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4557">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4557">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4558">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4558">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4559">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4560">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4560">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4561">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4562">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4562">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4563">该  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4563">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4564">找到一个  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4564">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4565">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4565">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4566">该  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4566">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4590">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4590">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4591">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4592">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4592">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4593">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4594">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4594">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4596">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4596">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4598">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4599">函数Func_french_drivers_license找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4599">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4600">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4600">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4727">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4727">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4728">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4728">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4729">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4729">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4730">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4730">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4731">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4731">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4732">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4732">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4733">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4733">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4734">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4734">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4735">21 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4735">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4736">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4736">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4737">21 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4737">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4738">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4738">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4739">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4739">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4740">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4740">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4741">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4741">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4742">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4742">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4743">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4744">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4744">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4745">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4746">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4747">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4747">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4748">找到Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4748">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4749">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4749">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4750">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4750">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4751">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4751">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4752">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4752">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4753">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4753">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4754">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4754">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4756">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4756">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4758">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4758">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4759">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4760">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4760">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4761">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4762">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4762">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4763">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4763">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4764">找到搜索Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4764">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4769">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4769">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4770">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4770">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4771">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4771">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4772">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4772">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4773">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4773">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4774">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4774">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4775">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4775">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4776">numéro d'assurance mal访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4776">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4778">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4778">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4779">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4779">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4781">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4781">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4783">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4783">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4784">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4784">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4785">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4785">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4786">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4786">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4788">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4788">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4790">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4791">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4791">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4792">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4792">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4813">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4813">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4814">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4814">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4815">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4816">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4816">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4817">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4818">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4818">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4819">13 个数字后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4819">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4820">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4820">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4821">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4821">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4822">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4822">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4823">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4823">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4824">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4824">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4825">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4825">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4826">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4826">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4827">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4827">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4828">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4828">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4829">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4829">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4830">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4830">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4831">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4831">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4832">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4858">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4858">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4860">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4860">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4862">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4862">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4863">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4863">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4864">1 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4864">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4865">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4865">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4866">2 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4866">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4867">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4867">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4868">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4868">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4869">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4869">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4870">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4870">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4871">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4871">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4872">3 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4872">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4874">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4874">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4876">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4877">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4877">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4878">找到一个  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4878">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4879">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4880">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4880">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4900">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4900">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4901">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4901">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4902">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4902">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4903">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4903">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4904">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4904">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4905">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4905">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4906">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4906">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4907">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4908">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4908">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4909">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4910">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4910">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4911">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4911">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4912">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4912">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4913">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4913">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4914">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4914">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4915">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4915">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4916">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4916">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4917">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4917">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4918">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4918">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4919">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4919">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4920">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4921">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4922">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4923">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4923">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4924">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4924">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4925">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4925">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4926">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4926">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4927">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4927">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4928">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4928">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4929">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4929">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4930">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4930">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4932">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4932">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4933">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4933">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4934">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur sur surur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4934">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4935">taxeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4935">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4936">taxe sur laur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4936">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4937">n° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4937">n° tva</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4940">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4940">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4941">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4942">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4942">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4943">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4943">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4944">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4944">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4945">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4945">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4946">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4946">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4947">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4947">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4948">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4948">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4949">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4949">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4950">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4950">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4951">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4951">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-4952">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4952">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-4953">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4954">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4954">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4955">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4955">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-4956">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-4956">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5105">德国身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5105">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5106">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5107">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5107">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5108">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5108">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5110">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5110">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5111">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5111">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5112">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5112">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5113">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5113">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5114">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5114">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5116">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5118">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5119">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5119">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5120">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5120">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5124">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5124">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5125">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5125">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5126">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5126">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5129">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5129">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5130">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5130">id-nummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5136">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5136">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5137">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5137">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5138">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5139">十个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5139">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5140">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5141">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5141">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5142">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5142">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5143">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5143">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5144">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5144">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5145">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5145">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5146">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5147">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5147">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5148">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5149">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5150">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5150">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5151">找到一个 `Keyword_german_passport` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5151">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5152">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5152">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5153">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5153">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5154">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5154">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5155">找到一个 `Keyword_german_passport` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5155">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5156">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5156">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
