## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5168">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5168">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5169">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5169">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5170">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5170">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5171">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5171">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5172">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5172">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5173">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5173">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5174">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5174">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5175">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5175">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5176">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5176">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5177">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5177">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5178">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5178">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5179">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5179">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5180">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5180">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5182">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5182">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5184">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5185">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5185">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5186">找到一个  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5186">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5187">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5188">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5188">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5214">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5214">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5215">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5215">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5216">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5216">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5217">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5217">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5218">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5218">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5219">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5219">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5220">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5220">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5222">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5222">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5223">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5224">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5224">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5225">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5225">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5226">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5226">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5227">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5227">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5228">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5228">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5229">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5229">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5230">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5230">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5231">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5231">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5232">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5232">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5234">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5236">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5237">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5237">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5238">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5238">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5239">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5240">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5240">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5250">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5250">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5251">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5252">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5252">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5253">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5254">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5254">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5255">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5255">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5256">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5256">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5257">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5257">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5258">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5258">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5259">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5259">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5260">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5260">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5388">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5388">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5390">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5390">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5391">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5391">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5392">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5392">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5393">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5393">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5394">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5394">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5395">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5395">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5396">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5396">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5397">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5397">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5398">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5399">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5399">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5400">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5401">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5402">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5402">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5403">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5403">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5404">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5404">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5405">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5405">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5406">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5406">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5407">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5407">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5408">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5408">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5409">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5409">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5410">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5410">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5411">希腊语警察局 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5411">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5412">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5412">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5413">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5413">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5414">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5414">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5415">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5415">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5416">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5416">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5417">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5417">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5418">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5418">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5419">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5419">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5420">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5420">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5421">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5421">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5422">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5423">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5423">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5424">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5425">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5425">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5426">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5426">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5427">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5427">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5442">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5442">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5443">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5443">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5444">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5444">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5445">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5445">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5446">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5446">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5447">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5447">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5448">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5448">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5449">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5449">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5450">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5450">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5451">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5452">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5452">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5453">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5454">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5454">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5455">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5456">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5456">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5457">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5458">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5459">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5459">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5460">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5460">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5489">香港身份证号码 (HKID) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5489">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5491">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5491">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5493">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5493">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5494">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5494">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5495">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5495">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5496">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5496">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5497">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5498">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5499">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5500">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5501">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5501">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5502">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5502">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5503">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5503">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5504">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5504">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5505">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5506">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5546">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5546">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5547">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5547">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5548">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5548">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5549">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5550">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5550">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5551">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5551">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5552">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5552">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5553">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5554">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5554">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5555">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5556">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5556">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5557">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5557">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5558">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5558">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5683">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5683">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5684">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5684">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5685">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5685">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5686">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5686">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5687">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5687">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5688">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5688">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5689">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5689">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5690">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5690">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5691">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5691">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5692">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5692">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5693">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5693">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5694">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2- 男性，对于在 1900 之前生活或具有双重公民关系公民的公民，也可以) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5694">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5695">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5695">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5696">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5696">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5697">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5697">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5698">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5699">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5699">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5700">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5701">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5701">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5702">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5702">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5703">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5703">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5704">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5705">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5705">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5706">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5706">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5707">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5707">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5708">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5708">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5709">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5709">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5710">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5710">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5711">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5711">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5712">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5712">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5713">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5713">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5714">személyazonosító igazolvcioy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5714">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5715">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5715">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5716">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5716">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5717">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5717">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5719">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5719">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5721">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5721">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5723">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5726">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5726">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5727">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5744">匈牙利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5744">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5745">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5745">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5747">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5747">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5748">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5749">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5749">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5751">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5754">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5754">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5755">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5755">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5756">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5757">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5757">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5777">匈牙利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5777">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5778">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5779">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5780">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5781">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5782">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5783">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5784">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5785">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5785">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5786">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5787">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5787">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5788">一个数字，必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5788">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5789">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5789">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5790">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5790">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5791">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5791">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5792">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5792">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5793">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5793">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5794">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5794">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5795">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5795">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5796">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5796">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5797">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5797">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5798">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5798">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5824">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5824">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5825">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5826">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5827">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5828">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5829">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5830">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5832">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5834">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5834">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5835">2 个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5835">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5836">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5836">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5837">8 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5837">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5838">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5839">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5839">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5840">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5841">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5842">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5842">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5843">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5843">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5844">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5844">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5845">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5845">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5859">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5859">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5860">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5861">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5861">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5862">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5863">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5863">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5864">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5864">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5865">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5865">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5866">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5866">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5867">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5867">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5868">字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5868">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5869">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5870">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5870">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5871">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5872">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5872">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5873">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5873">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5874">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5874">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5875">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5875">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5876">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5876">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5877">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5877">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5878">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5878">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5879">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5879">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5881">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5881">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5882">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5883">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5883">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5884">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5885">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5885">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5886">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5886">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5887">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5887">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5888">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5889">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5889">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5890">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5890">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5891">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5891">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5892">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5892">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5893">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5893">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5894">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5894">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5895">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5895">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5896">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5896">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5897">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5897">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5898">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5898">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5899">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5899">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5900">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5900">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5901">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5901">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5902">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5902">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5903">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5903">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5904">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5904">aadhaar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5906">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5906">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5907">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5907">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5908">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5908">आधार</span></span>
