## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5910">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5910">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5912">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5912">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5913">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5914">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5914">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5915">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5915">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5916">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5916">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5917">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5917">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5918">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5918">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5919">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5920">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5920">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5921">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5921">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5922">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5922">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5923">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5924">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5924">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5925">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5926">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5926">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5927">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5927">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5928">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5928">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5929">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5929">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5930">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5930">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5931">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5931">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5932">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5932">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5933">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5933">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5934">IBAN 服务 (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5934">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5936">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5936">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5938">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5938">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5939">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5939">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5940">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5940">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5941">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5941">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5942">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5942">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5945">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5945">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5946">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5947">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5947">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5948">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5949">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5949">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5950">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5950">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5951">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5952">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5952">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5953">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5953">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5954">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5954">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5955">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5955">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5956">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5956">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5957">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5957">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5958">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5958">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5959">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5960">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5960">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5961">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5962">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5962">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5963">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5963">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5964">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5965">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5965">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5966">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5966">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5967">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5967">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5968">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5968">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5969">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5969">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5970">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5970">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5971">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5971">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5972">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5972">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5973">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5973">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5974">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5974">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5975">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5975">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5976">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5976">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5977">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5977">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5978">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5978">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5979">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5979">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5980">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5980">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5981">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5981">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5982">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5983">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5984">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5984">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5985">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5985">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5986">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5987">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5987">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5988">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5988">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-5989">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5989">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5990">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5990">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5991">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5992">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5992">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5993">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5993">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5994">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5994">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5995"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5995">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5996">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5996">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5997">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-5998">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5998">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-5999">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-5999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6000">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6000">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6001">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6001">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6002">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6002">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6003">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6003">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6004">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6004">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6005">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6005">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6006">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6006">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6007">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6007">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6008">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6008">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6009">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6009">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6010">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6010">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6011">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6011">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6012">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6012">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6013">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6013">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6014">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6014">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6015">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6015">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6016">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6016">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6018">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6018">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6019">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6020">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6020">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6021">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6021">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6022">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6022">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6023">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6024">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6024">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6025">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6026">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6027">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6027">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6028">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6028">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6152">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6152">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6153">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6153">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6155">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6155">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6156">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6157">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6157">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6158">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6158">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6159">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6159">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6160">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6161">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6161">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6162">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6163">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6163">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6164">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6164">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6165">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6165">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6186">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6186">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6188">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6188">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6189">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6189">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6190">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6190">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6191">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6191">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6192">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6193">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6193">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6194">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6194">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6195">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6195">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6196">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6196">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6197">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6197">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6198">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6198">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6199">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6199">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6201">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6201">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6203">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6203">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6204">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6204">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6205">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6205">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6206">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6207">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6207">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6208">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6209">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6254">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6254">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6256">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6256">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6257">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6258">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6258">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6259">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6259">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6260">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6260">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6261">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6261">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6262">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6262">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6263">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6263">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6264">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6264">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6265">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6265">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6266">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6267">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6267">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6268">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6269">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6270">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6270">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6271">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6271">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6278">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6278">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6280">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6280">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6281">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6282">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6282">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6283">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6284">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6284">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6285">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6286">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6286">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6287">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6287">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6288">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6288">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6289">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6289">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6308">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6308">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6309">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6310">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6310">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6311">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6312">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6312">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6313">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6313">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6314">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6314">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6315">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6315">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6316">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6316">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6317">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6318">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6318">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6319">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6320">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6321">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6321">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6322">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6322">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6330">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6330">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6331">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6331">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6332">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6332">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6333">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6333">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6334">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6334">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6335">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6335">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6336">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6336">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6337">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6337">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6338">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6338">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6339">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6339">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6340">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6340">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6341">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6341">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6342">三个字母，分别对应于名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6342">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6343">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6343">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6344">一个字母，对应于出生日期月份中的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，一月是 A，十月是 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6344">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6345">与出生日期对应的两个数字 -为了区分性别，将 40 添加到性别的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6345">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6346">四个数字，对应于某人所 (的国家/地区代码所特有的地区代码，用于) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6346">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6347">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6347">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6348">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6349">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6349">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6350">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6351">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6351">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6352">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6352">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6353">找到一个  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6353">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6354">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6354">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6355">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6355">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6390">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6390">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6391">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6391">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6393">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6393">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6394">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6395">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6395">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6396">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6396">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6397">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6397">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6398">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6399">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6399">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6400">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6402">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6402">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6403">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6403">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6424">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6424">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6425">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6425">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6426">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6426">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6427">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6427">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6428">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6428">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6429">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6429">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6430">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6430">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6432">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6432">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6433">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6434">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6434">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6435">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6435">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6436">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6436">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6437">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6437">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6438">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6438">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6439">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6440">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6440">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6441">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6442">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6442">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6443">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6443">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6444">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6444">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6445">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6445">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6446">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6446">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6454">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6454">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6456">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6456">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6458">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6458">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6459">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6459">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6460">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6460">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6461">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6461">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6462">可选 (或短) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6462">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6463">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6463">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6464">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6464">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6465">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6465">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6466">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6466">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6467">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6467">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6468">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6468">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6469">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6469">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6470">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6470">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6471">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6471">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6472">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6472">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6473">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6474">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6474">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6475">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6475">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6476">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6476">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6477">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6477">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6478">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6478">Checking Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6479">Checking Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6479">Checking Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6480">Checking Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6480">Checking Account #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6481">Checking Acct Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6481">Checking Acct Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6482">Checking Acct #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6482">Checking Acct #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6483">Checking Acct No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6483">Checking Acct No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6484">Checking Account No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6484">Checking Account No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6522">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6522">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6524">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6524">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6525">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6526">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6526">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6527">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6527">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6528">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6528">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6529">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6529">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6530">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6531">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6531">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6532">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6532">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6570">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6570">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6571">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6571">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6572">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6572">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6573">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6573">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6574">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6574">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6575">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6575">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6576">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6576">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6578">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6578">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6580">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6580">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6581">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6581">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6582">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6583">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6584">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6584">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6585">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6586">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6586">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6587">该函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6587">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6588">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6588">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6589">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6589">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6590">该函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6590">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6603">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6603">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6604">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6604">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6605">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6605">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6606">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6606">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6607">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6607">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6608">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6608">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6609">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6609">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6610">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6611">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6611">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6613">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6613">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6614">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6614">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6615">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6615">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6616">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6616">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6617">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6617">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6618">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6618">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6619">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6620">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6620">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6621">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6622">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6622">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6623">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6623">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6624">找到搜索Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6624">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6625">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6625">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6626">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6626">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6639">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6639">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6641">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6641">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6643">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6643">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6644">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6645">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6645">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6646">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6647">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6648">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6648">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6649">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6649">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6666">日本居民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6666">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6668">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6668">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6669">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6670">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6670">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6671">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6671">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6672">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6672">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6673">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6673">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6675">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6675">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6678">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6678">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6679">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6679">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6680">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6680">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6681">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6681">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6682">住宅卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6682">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6683">住宅卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6683">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6684">居住地卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6684">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6685">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6685">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6686">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6686">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6687">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6687">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6688">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6688">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6690">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6690">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6692">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6692">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6693">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6694">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6694">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6695">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6697">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6697">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6698">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6698">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6700">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6700">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>
