- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6703">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6703">Resident Registration No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6705">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6705">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6706">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6706">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6711">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6711">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6713">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6713">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6715">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6715">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6716">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6716">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6717">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6717">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6718">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6718">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6719">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6719">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6720">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6721">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6721">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6722">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6723">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6724">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6724">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6725">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6725">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6727">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6727">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6728">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6728">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6745">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6745">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6749">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6749">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6750">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6751">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6751">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6752">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6753">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6753">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6754">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6754">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6755">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6755">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6757">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6757">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6759">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6759">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6760">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6760">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6761">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6761">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6886">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6886">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6887">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6888">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6888">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6889">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6890">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6890">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6891">11 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6891">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6892">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6892">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6893">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6893">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6894">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"，"1"表示 20 世纪，"2"对应于 21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6894">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6895">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6895">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6896">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6896">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6897">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6897">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6898">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6898">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6899">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6899">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6900">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6901">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6901">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6902">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6903">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6903">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6904">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6904">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6905">找到一个  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6905">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6906">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6906">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6907">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6907">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6970">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6970">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6971">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6971">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6972">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6973">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6973">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6974">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6975">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6975">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6976">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6976">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6977">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6977">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6979">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-6980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-6981">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6982">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6982">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-6983">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-6983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7003">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7003">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7005">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7005">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7007">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7007">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7012">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7012">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7013">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7138">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7138">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7139">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7139">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7140">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7140">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7141">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7141">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7142">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7142">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7143">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7143">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7144">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7144">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7145">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7146">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7146">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7147">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7148">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7148">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7149">1 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7149">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7150">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7150">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7151">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7151">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7152">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7152">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7153">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7154">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7154">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7155">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7156">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7156">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7157">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7157">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7158">找到一个  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7158">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7159">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7160">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7160">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7195">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7195">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7196">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7196">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7197">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7197">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7198">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7198">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7199">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7199">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7200">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7200">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7202">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7202">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7204">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7204">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7205">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7205">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7206">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7206">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7223">都明网驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7223">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7224">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7225">不带空格和分隔符的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7225">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7226">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7227">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7227">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7229">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7232">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7232">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7233">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7357"> (布尔自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7357">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7358">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7358">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7359">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7359">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7360">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7360">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7361">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7361">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7362">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7362">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7363">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7363">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7365">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7365">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7366">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7367">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7367">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7368">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7368">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7369">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7369">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7370">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7371">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7371">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7372">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7373">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7373">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7374">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7374">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7375">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7376">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7377">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7377">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7400">比塞明卡护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7400">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7401">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7401">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7402">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7403">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7403">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7404">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7405">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7405">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7407">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7407">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7410">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7410">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7411">找到一个  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7411">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7413">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7413">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7418"> (非自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7418">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7419">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7420">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7420">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7421">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7422">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7422">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7423">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7423">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7424">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7424">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7425">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7425">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7426">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7426">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7427">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7427">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7428">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7428">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7429">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7430">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7430">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7431">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7432">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7433">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7434">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7434">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7435">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7435">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7436">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7436">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7437">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7438">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7438">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7478">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7478">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7479">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7480">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7480">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7481">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7482">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7482">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7483">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7483">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7484">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7484">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7485">双字母的出生日期代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7485">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7486">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7486">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7487">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7487">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7488">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7488">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7489">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7490">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7490">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7491">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7492">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7492">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7493">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7493">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7494">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7494">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7521">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7521">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7522">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7523">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7523">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7524">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7524">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7525">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7525">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7526">两个字符 (或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7526">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7527">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7527">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7528">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7528">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7529">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7529">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7530">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7531">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7532">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7532">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7533">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7534">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7535">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7535">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7536">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7536">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7660">马耳他身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7660">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7661">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7661">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7662">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7662">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7663">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7663">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7664">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7664">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7665">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7665">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7666">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7666">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7668">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7668">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7669">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7670">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7670">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7671">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7671">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7672">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7672">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7673">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7674">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7674">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7675">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7676">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7677">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7677">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7678">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7679">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7679">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7680">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7680">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7697">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7697">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7698">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7698">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7699">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7699">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7700">不带空格或分隔符的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7700">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7701">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7701">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7702">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7702">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7704">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7704">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7706">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7706">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7707">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7707">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7708">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7725">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7725">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7727">对于马耳他语的公民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7727">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7728">指定模式中七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7728">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7729">非马耳他语国家/省和马耳他实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7729">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7730">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7730">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7731">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7732">马耳他语：七位数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7732">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7733">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7733">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7734">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7734">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7735">非马耳他语和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7735">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7736">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7736">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7737">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7737">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7738">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7738">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7739">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7739">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7740">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7740">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7741">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7741">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7742">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7742">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7743">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7744">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7744">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7777">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7777">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7778">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7779">包含可选空格的八九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7779">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7780">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7781">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7781">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7782">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7782">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7783">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7783">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7784">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7784">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7785">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7785">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7786">两位三位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7786">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7788">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7791">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7791">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7792">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7792">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7793">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7817">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7817">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7819">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7819">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7820">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7821">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7821">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7822">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7822">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7823">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7823">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7824">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7824">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7825">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7825">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7826">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7826">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7827">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7827">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7955">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7955">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7956">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7956">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7957">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7957">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7958">无空格或分隔符的九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7958">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7959">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7959">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7960">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7960">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7961">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7962">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7962">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7963">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7964">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7965">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7965">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7966">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7966">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7976">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7976">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7977">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7978">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7979">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7980">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7981">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7982">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7984">不带空格或分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7984">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7986">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7986">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7987">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7988">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7988">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-7989">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7990">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7990">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7991">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7991">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7992">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7992">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-7993">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7993">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-7994">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-7994">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8032">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8032">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8033">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8033">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8034">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8034">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8035">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8035">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8036">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8036">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8037">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8037">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8038">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8038">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8039">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8039">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8040">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8040">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8041">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8041">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8042">14 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8042">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8043">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8043">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8044">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8044">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8045">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8045">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8046">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8046">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8047">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8047">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8048">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8048">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8049">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8049">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8050">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8051">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8051">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8052">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8053">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8053">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8054">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8054">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8055">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8055">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8056">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8056">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8057">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8057">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
