## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8066">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8066">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8067">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8067">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8068">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8068">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8069">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8069">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8070">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8070">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8071">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8071">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8072">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8072">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8074">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8074">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8075">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8076">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8076">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8077">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8077">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8078">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8078">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8079">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8079">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8080">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8080">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8081">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8081">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8082">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8082">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8083">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8083">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8084">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8084">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8085">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8086">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8086">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8087">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8088">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8088">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8089">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8089">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8090">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8090">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8091">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8091">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8092">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8092">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8100">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8100">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8101">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8101">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8102">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8102">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8103">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8103">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8104">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8104">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8105">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8105">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8106">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8106">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8108">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8108">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8110">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8110">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8111">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8111">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8112">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8112">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8113">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8114">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8115">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8116">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8117">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8117">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8118">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8118">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8119">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8119">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8120">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8120">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8121">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8121">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8122">Keyword_new_zealand_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8122">Keyword_new_zealand_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8128">driverslic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8128">driverslic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8130">driverslicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8130">driverslicences</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8134">drivers licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8134">drivers licences</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8187">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8187">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8188">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8188">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8189">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8189">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8190">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8190">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8191">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8191">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8192">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8192">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8193">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8193">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8194">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8195">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8195">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8196">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8197">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8197">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8198">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8198">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8199">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8199">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8201">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8201">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8202">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8204">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8206">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8207">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8207">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8208">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8208">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8209">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8210">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8210">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8211">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8211">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8212">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8212">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8213">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8213">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8214">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8214">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8215">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8215">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8216">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8216">new zealand ird</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8219">新西兰医疗局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8219">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8220">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8221">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8221">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8222">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8222">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8223">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8223">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8224">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8224">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8225">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8225">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8226">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8227">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8227">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8228">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8229">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8229">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8230">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8230">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8231">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8231">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8232">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8232">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8233">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8234">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8234">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8235">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8235">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8249">新西兰社会关系号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8249">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8250">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8250">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8251">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8251">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8252">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8252">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8253">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8253">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8254">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8254">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8255">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8255">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8256">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8257">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8257">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8258">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8259">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8259">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8260">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8260">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8261">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8261">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8262">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8263">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8263">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8264">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8264">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8265">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8265">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8266">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8266">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8267">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8267">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8268">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8268">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8269">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8269">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8270">找到搜索Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8270">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8271">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8271">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8272">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8272">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8274">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8274">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8275">social 40#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8275">social welfare #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8277">social no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8277">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8278">社交4004</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8278">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8279">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8279">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8280">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8280">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8282">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8282">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8283">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8284">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8284">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8285">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8285">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8286">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8286">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8287">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8287">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8288">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8288">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8289">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8289">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8290">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8290">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8291">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8291">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8292">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8292">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8293">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8293">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8294">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8294">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8295">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8296">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8296">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8297">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8297">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8298">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8298">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8299">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8299">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8300">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8300">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8301">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8301">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8302">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8302">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8303">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8303">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8304">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8304">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8305">Fselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8305">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8306">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8306">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8307">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8308">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8308">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8309">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8310">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8310">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8311">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8311">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8312">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8312">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8313">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8313">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8314">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8314">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8315">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8315">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8316">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8317">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8317">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8318">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8319">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8319">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8320">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8320">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8321">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8321">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8322">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8322">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8323">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8323">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8324">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8324">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8325">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8325">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8326">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8326">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8327">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8327">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8328">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8328">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8330">14 个数字，包含 2 个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8330">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8332">14 个数字和 2 个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8332">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8333">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8333">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8334">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8334">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8335">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8336">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8336">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8337">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8337">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8338">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8339">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8340">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8341">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8342">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8342">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8343">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8343">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8344">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8344">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8345">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8345">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8346">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8346">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8347">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8347">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8348">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8348">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8349">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8349">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8350">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8350">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8351">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8351">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8352">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8352">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8353">驱动程序 lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8353">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8354">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8354">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8355">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8355">driver licenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8356">driver licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8356">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8357">driver licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8357">driver licences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8358">driverslic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8358">driverslic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8359">driverslics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8359">driverslics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8360">driverslicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8360">driverslicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8361">driverslicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8361">driverslicences</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8467">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8467">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8468">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8468">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8469">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8469">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8470">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8470">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8471">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8471">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8472">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8473">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8473">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8474">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8475">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8475">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8476">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8476">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8477">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8477">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8478">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8478">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8479">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8479">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8482">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8482">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8483">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8483">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8484">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8484">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8485">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8485">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8489">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8489">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8491">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8491">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8493">6 个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8493">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8494">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8494">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8495">1 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8495">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8496">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8497">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8498">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8499">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8499">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8500">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8500">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8501">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8501">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8502">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8503">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8504">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8504">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8505">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8517">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8517">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8518">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8518">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8520">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8520">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8522">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8522">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8523">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8524">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8525">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8526">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8526">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8527">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8527">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8528">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8528">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8529">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8530">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8530">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8531">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8531">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8532">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8532">Numer paszportu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8535">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8535">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8536">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8536">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8537">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8537">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8538">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8538">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8539">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8539">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8540">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8540">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8541">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8541">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8542">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8542">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8544">九位数或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8544">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8545">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8546">九位数字或 14 位号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8546">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8547">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8547">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8548">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8548">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8549">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8549">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8550">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8550">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8552">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8555">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8555">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8556">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8556">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8557">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8557">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8558">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8558">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8575">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8575">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8576">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8576">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8577">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8577">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8578">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8578">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8579">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8579">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8580">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8580">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8581">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8581">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8582">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8583">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8583">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8584">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8584">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8585">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8585">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8586">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8587">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8587">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8588">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8589">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8589">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8590">该  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8590">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8591">找到一个  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8591">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8592">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8592">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8593">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8593">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8594">nip#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8594">nip#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8596">numer identyfikacji podatkowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8596">numer identyfikacji podatkowej</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8597">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8597">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8598">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8598">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8621">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8621">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8623">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8623">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8625">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8625">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8627">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8629">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8630">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8630">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8631">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8631">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8651">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8651">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8652">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8653">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8653">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8654">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8655">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8655">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8656">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8656">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8657">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8657">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8658">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8658">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8659">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8659">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8660">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8660">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8661">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字，带特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8661">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8662">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8662">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8663">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8663">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8664">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8664">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8665">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8665">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8666">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8666">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8668">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8671">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8671">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8672">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8672">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8804">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8804">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8805">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8805">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8807">一个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8807">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8809">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8809">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8810">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8810">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8811">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8811">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8812">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8813">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8813">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8814">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8815">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8815">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8816">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8816">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8817">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8817">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8841">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8841">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8843">包含可选空格的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8843">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8844">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8844">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8845">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8845">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8846">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8846">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8847">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8847">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8848">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8848">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8849">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8849">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8851">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8854">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8854">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8855">找到一个  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8855">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8856">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8857">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8857">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8882">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8882">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8883">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8883">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8884">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8884">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8885">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8885">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8886">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8886">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8887">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8887">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8888">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8888">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8889">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8890">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8890">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-8891">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-8892">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8893">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8893">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-8894">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-8894">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9022">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9022">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9023">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9023">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9024">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9024">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9025">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9025">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9026">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9026">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9027">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9027">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9028">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9028">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9029">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9030">13 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9030">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9031">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9031">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9032">1 位到 9 位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9032">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9033">表示 YYMMDD (出生日期的 6 个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9033">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9034">2 个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9034">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9035">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9035">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9036">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9036">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9037">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9037">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9038">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9038">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9039">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9039">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9040">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9040">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9041">找到一个  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9041">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9042">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9043">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9043">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
