## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9094">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9094">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9095">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9095">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9096">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9097">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9097">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9098">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9099">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9099">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9100">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9100">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9101">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9101">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9102">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9102">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9103">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9103">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9104">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9104">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9105">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9105">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9120">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9120">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9121">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9121">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9122">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9122">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9123">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9123">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9124">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9124">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9125">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9125">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9126">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9126">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9128">十位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9128">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9129">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9130">十位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9130">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9131">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9131">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9132">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9132">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9133">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9133">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9134">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9134">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9135">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9135">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9136">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9137">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9137">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9138">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9140">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9140">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9141">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9141">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9158">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9158">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9159">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9159">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9160">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9160">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9161">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9161">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9162">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9162">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9163">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9163">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9164">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9164">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9166">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9166">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9167">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9168">九位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9168">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9169">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9169">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9170">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9170">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9171">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9171">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9173">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9173">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9176">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9176">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9177">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9177">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9194">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9194">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9195">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9196">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9196">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9197">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9197">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9198">十个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9198">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9199">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9199">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9200">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9200">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9201">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9201">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9202">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9203">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9203">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9204">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9204">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9205">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9205">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9206">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9206">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9207">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9207">Identification Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9210">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9210">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9211">新加坡国家/ (身份证号码) NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9211">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9212">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9213">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9213">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9214">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9214">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9215">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9215">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9216">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9216">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9217">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9217">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9218">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9218">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9220">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9223">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9223">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9224">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9224">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9225">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9226">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9227">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9227">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9228">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9228">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9239">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9239">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9240">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9241">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9241">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9242">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9243">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9243">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9244">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9244">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9245">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9245">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9247">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9250">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9250">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9251">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9251">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9377">斯洛伐克个人编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9377">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9378">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9378">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9379">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9379">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9380">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9380">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9381">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9381">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9382">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9382">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9383">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9383">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9384">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9385">包含可选反反杠的九个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9385">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9386">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9386">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9387">6 个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9387">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9388">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9388">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9389">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9389">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9390">1 个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9390">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9392">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9392">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9394">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9395">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9395">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9396">找到一个  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9397">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9397">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9398">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9398">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9445">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9445">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9446">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9446">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9448">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9448">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9450">一个数字或字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9450">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9451">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9452">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9453">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9455">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9455">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9456">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9456">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9475">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9475">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9476">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9477">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9477">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9478">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9479">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9479">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9481">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9481">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9483">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9483">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9484">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9484">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9485">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9485">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9612">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9612">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9613">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9613">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9614">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9614">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9615">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9615">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9616">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9616">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9617">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9617">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9618">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9618">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9619">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9619">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9620">13 个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9620">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9621">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9621">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9622">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9622">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9623">对应于 DDMMLLL (的七个数字) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9623">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9624">对应于出生日期"50"的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9624">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9625">三个数字，对应于同一天（男性为 (000-499）和 500-999（对于男性）的性别和序列号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9625">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9626">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9626">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9627">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9628">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9628">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9629">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9630">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9630">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9631">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9631">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9632">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9632">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9633">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9633">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9634">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9634">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9662">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9662">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9663">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9665">两个字母后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9665">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9667">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9667">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9668">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9668">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9669">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9669">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9670">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9672">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9672">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9675">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9675">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9676">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9689">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9689">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9690">以tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9690">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9691">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9691">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9696">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9696">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9697">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9697">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9698">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9698">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9699">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9699">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9700">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9700">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9701">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9701">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9702">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9702">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9704">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9704">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9705">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9705">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9706">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9706">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9707">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9707">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9708">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9708">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9709">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9709">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9710">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9710">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9711">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9711">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9712">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9712">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9713">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9713">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9714">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9714">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9715">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9715">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9716">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9716">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9740">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9740">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9742">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9742">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9744">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9744">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9745">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9745">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9746">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9746">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9747">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9747">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9748">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9748">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9749">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9749">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9751">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9751">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9754">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9754">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9755">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9755">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9756">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9756">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9757">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9757">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9758">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9758">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9762">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9762">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9764">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9764">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9765">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9766">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9766">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9767">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9767">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9768">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9769">由世纪和性别确定的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9769">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9770">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9770">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9771">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9771">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9772">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9772">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9774">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9776">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9776">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9777">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9777">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9778">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9778">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9779">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9780">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9780">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9781">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9781">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9782">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9783">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9783">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9784">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9784">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9787">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9787">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9788">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9788">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9789">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9789">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9790">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9790">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9791">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9792">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9792">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9793">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9794">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9794">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9795">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9795">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9796">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9796">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9798">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9798">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9801">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9801">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9802">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9802">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9804">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9804">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9938">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9938">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9939">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9939">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9940">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9940">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9941">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9941">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9942">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9942">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9943">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9943">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9944">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9944">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9945">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9946">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9946">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9948">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9948">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9949">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9949">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9950">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9950">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9951">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9951">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9952">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9952">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9953">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9953">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9954">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9954">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9955">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9955">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9956">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9956">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9957">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9957">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9958">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9958">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9959">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9959">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9983">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9983">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9984">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9984">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9985">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9986">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9986">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9987">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9987">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9988">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9988">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9989">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9989">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9990">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9990">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9991">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9991">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9992">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9993">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9993">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-9994">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-9995">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9995">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9996">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9996">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-9997">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-9997">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10023">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10023">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10024">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10024">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10026">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10026">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10027">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10028">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10028">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10029">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10029">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10030">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10030">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10031">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10031">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10032">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10032">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10033">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10033">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10034">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10035">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10036">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10037">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10037">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10038">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10038">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10039">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10039">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10040">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10040">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10041">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10041">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10042">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10042">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10043">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10043">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10044">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10044">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10045">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10045">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10046">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10046">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10047">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10047">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10048">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10048">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10049">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10050">指定模式中七个或八个数字以及一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10050">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10051">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10052">拥有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10052">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10053">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10053">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10054">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10054">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10055">没有西班牙国家身份证的非居民西班牙人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10055">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10056">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10056">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10057">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10057">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10058">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10058">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10059">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童居民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10059">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10060">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10060">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10061">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10061">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10062">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10062">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10063">具有一个百万美元标识号的百万美元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10063">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10064">一个区分大小写的大写字母"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10064">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10065">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10065">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10066">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10066">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10067">没有一个百万的标识号的亿元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10067">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10068">一个区分大小写的大写字母"M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10068">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10069">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10069">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10070">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10070">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10071">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10072">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10072">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10073">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10074">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10074">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10075">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10075">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10076">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10076">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10077">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10077">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10078">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10078">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
