## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10109">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10109">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10110">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10111">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10111">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10112">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10112">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10113">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10113">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10114">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10114">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10115">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10115">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10116">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10116">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10117">不是美元符号 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号为 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10117">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10118">7-128 个字符（不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10118">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10119">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10119">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10120">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10120">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10121">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10121">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10122">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10122">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10123">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10123">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10124">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10124">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10125">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter **关键字** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10125">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10126">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10126">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10127">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10127">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10128">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10128">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10129">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10129">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10130">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10130">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10131">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10131">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10132">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10132">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10133">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10133">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10134">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10134">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10135"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10135">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10136">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和星号 (\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10136">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10137">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10137">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10138">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10138">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10139">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10139">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10140">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10140">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10141">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10141">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10155">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10155">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10157">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10157">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10159">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10159">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10160">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10160">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10161">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10161">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10162">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10162">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10164">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10164">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10166">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10167">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10167">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10168">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10168">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10301">瑞典国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10301">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10303">10 位或 12 位和可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10303">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10305">10 位或 12 位以及可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10305">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10306">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10306">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10307">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10307">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10308">"-"或"+"分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10308">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10309">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10309">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10310">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10311">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10311">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10312">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10313">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10313">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10314">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10314">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10315">找到一个 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10315">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10316">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10317">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10317">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10318">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10318">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10319">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10319">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10338">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10338">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10339">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10339">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10340">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10341">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10341">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10342">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10343">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10343">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10344">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10345">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10345">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10346">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10347">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10347">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10348">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10348">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10349">下列情况之一为 true：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10349">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10350">找到Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10350">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10351">找到Keyword_sweden_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10351">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10382">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10382">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10383">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10383">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10384">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10385">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10385">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10386">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10387">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10387">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10388">对应于 YYYYMMDD (出生日期的八个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10388">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10389">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10389">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10390">序列号中的最后一个数字通过为男性分配奇数和偶数表示性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10390">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10391">截至 1990 年，序列号的分配对应于该号码的拥有人在 1947 年 1 月 1 日) 其生活地点为 1947 年 1 月 1 日 (该号码的拥有人所基于的省/市/县，特殊代码 (通常为 9 作为) 第 7 位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10391">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10392">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10392">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10393">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10393">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10394">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10394">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10395">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10395">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10396">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10396">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10397">该  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10397">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10398">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10398">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10399">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10399">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10400">该  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10400">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10416">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10416">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10417">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10418">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10419">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10420">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10421">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10422">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10423">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10424">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10424">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10425">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10426">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10426">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10427">与 YYMMDD (的出生日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10427">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10428">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10428">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10429">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10429">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10430">对于 1990 之前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或外种人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10430">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10431">第九个位置的数字表示性别（对于男性或甚至对于男性）为奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10431">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10432">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10432">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10433">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10434">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10434">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10435">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10436">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10436">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10437">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10437">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10438">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10438">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10439">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10440">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10440">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10466">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10466">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10468">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10468">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10469">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10470">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10470">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10471">四个字母银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10471">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10472">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10472">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10473">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10473">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10474">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10475">BBAN 代码的剩余部分 (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10475">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10476">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10477">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10477">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10478">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10479">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10479">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10480">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10480">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10481">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10481">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10482">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10482">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10518">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10518">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10519">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10519">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10520">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10520">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10521">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10521">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10522">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10522">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10523">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10523">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10524">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10524">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10525">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10526">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10526">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10527">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10528">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10528">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10529">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10529">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10530">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10530">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10531">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10531">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10532">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10532">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10533">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10533">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10534">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10534">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10535">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10535">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10537">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10537">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10539">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10539">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10540">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10540">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10541">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10541">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10542">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10543">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10543">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10564">台湾地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10564">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10566">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10566">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10567">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10568">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10568">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10569">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10569">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10570">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10570">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10571">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10571">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10572">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10573">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10574">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10575">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10576">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10576">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10577">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10577">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10578">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10578">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10579">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10580">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10580">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10581">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10581">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10598">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10598">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10599">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10600">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10600">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10601">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10601">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10602">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10602">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10603">生物识别护照号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10603">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10604">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10604">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10605">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10605">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10606">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10606">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10607">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10607">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10608">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10609">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10609">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10610">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10611">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10611">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10612">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10612">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10613">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10613">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10618">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10618">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10619">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10619">Passport Num</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10622">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10622">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10623">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10623">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10624">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10624">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10625">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10626">十个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10626">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10627">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10628">十个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10628">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10629">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10629">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10630">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10630">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10631">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10632">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10632">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10633">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10634">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10634">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10635">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10635">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10636">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10636">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10637">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10637">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10638">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10638">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10639">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10639">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10640">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10640">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10641">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10641">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10642">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10642">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10643">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10643">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10644">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10644">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10645">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10645">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10646">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10646">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10647">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10647">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10648">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10648">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10649">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10649">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10650">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10650">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10651">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10652">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10652">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10653">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10654">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10654">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10655">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10655">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10656">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10656">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10657">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10658">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10658">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10659">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10660">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10660">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10661">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10661">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10662">找到搜索Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10662">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10663">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10663">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10664">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10664">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10665">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10665">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10666">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10666">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10667">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10667">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10668">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10668">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10669">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10669">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10670">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10670">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10671">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10671">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10672">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10672">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10673">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10673">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10675">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10675">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10677">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10678">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10679">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10680">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10681">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10681">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10682">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10682">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10683">找到搜索Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10683">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10684">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10685">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10685">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10686">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10687">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10687">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10688">TC Kimkim No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10688">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10689">TC Kim一 nu一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10689">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10690">Vatanda？lk nu一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10690">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10691">Vatanda？l 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10691">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10692">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10692">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10693">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10693">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10694">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10694">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10696">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10696">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10698">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10698">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10699">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10699">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10700">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10700">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10701">如果驱动程序是男性（即 51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12 位），则日期格式 MMDDY 中用于出生日期的 5 个数字 (第 7 个字符将递增 50) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10701">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10702">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10702">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10703">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10703">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10705">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10708">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10708">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10709">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10709">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10710">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10728">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10728">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10729">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10729">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10731">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10731">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10732">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10733">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10733">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10734">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10735">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10735">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10736">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10737">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10737">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10738">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10738">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10739">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10739">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10740">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10740">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10741">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10741">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10742">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10742">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10743">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10743">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10744">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10744">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10745">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10745">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10746">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10746">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10747">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10747">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10749">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10749">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10750">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10751">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10751">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10752">三个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10752">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10753">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10753">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10754">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10754">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10755">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10755">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10756">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10756">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10757">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10758">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10758">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10759">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10760">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10761">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10761">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10762">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10762">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10763">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10763">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10764">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10764">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10765">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10765">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10766">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10766">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10767">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10767">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10768">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10768">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10769">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10769">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10770">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10770">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10771">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10771">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10772">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10772">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10773">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10773">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10774">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10774">patient id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10776">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10776">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10777">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10777">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10778">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10778">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10779">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10779">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10780">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10780">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10781">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10781">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10782">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10782">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10783">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10783">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10784">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10784">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10785">NINO 国家/ (号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10785">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10786">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/区标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10786">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10787">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10788">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10788">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10789">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10790">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10790">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10791">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10791">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10792">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10792">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10793">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10793">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10794">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10794">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10795">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10795">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10796">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10796">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10797">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10797">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10798">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10798">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10799">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10799">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10800">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10800">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10801">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10801">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10802">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10802">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10803">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10803">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10808">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10808">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10809">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10809">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10810">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10811">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10811">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10833">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10833">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10834">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10834">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10835">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10842">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10842">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10844">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10844">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10845">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10846">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10846">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10847">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10848">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10848">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10849">该  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10849">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10850">找到一个  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10850">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10870">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10870">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10871">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10871">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10872">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10872">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10873">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10873">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10874">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10874">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10875">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10876">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10876">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10877">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10878">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10878">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10879">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10879">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10880">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10880">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
