## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10910">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10910">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10912">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10912">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10913">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10914">取决于州 - 例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10914">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10915">9 个数字，格式设置为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10915">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10916">9 个数字（如 dddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10916">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10918">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-10919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10920">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10921">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10921">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10922">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10922">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10923">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10923">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-10924">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10924">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10925">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10925">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10926">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10926">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10927">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10927">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-10928">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-10928">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11026">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11026">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11027">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11028">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11028">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11029">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11030">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11030">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11031">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11031">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11032">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11032">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11033">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11033">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11034">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11034">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11035">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11035">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11036">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11036">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11037">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11037">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11038">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11038">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11039">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11039">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11040">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11040">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11041">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11041">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11042">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11042">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11043">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11043">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11044">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11044">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11045">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11045">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11046">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11046">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11047">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11047">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11048">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11048">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11049">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11049">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11050">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11050">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11051">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11051">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11052">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11052">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11053">该函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11053">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11054">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11054">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11068">SSN (美国社会保险号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11068">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11069">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11069">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11070">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11070">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11071">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11071">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11072">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11072">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11073">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11073">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11074">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11074">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11075">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11075">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11076">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11076">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11077">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11077">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11078">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11079">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11079">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11080">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11081">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11082">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11082">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11083">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11083">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11085">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11085">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11086">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11086">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11087">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11087">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11088">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11088">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11089">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11089">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11090">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11090">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11091">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11091">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11092">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11092">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11107">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11107">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11108">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11108">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11109">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11109">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11110">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11110">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11113">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11115">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11119">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11119">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11120">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11120">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11141">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11141">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11142">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11142">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11143">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11143">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11144">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11144">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11145">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11145">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11146">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11146">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11147">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11147">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11148">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11148">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11149">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11149">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11150">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11150">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11151">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11151">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11152">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11153">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11153">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11154">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11155">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11156">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11156">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11157">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11157">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11158">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11158">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11166">乌克兰护照国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11166">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11167">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11167">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11168">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11168">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11169">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11169">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11170">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11170">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11171">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11171">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11172">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11172">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11173">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11174">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11174">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11175">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11176">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11176">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11177">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11177">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11178">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11178">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11179">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11180">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e477d-11181">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e477d-11182">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11183">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11183">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e477d-11184">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e477d-11184">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
